title: Product Options
description: A component that shows the product image, name, price, and options.

body.raw:
<ComponentExample src="/components/examples/product-options/demo.tsx">
  <ProductOptionsDemo />
</ComponentExample>

## Installation

1. Install the `@radix-ui/react-select` and `@radix-ui/react-radio-group` component from radix-ui:

```bash
npm install @radix-ui/react-select
```

```bash
npm install @radix-ui/react-radio-group
```
